Based on your interest in a story that explores "what" and "kind", I'd recommend "Her" (2013). This film is a beautiful blend of sci-fi romance, exploring what it means to be human in today's digital age. With Scarlett Johansson voicing Samantha, an operating system designed to meet the needs of her human companion, this movie will have you pondering the complexities of love and connection.

If you're looking for something a bit more lighthearted, "What If..." could be an entertaining choice! This 1990s-inspired rom-com features Kristy Swanson and John Ratzenberger in a charming tale that asks what would happen if fate took a different turn.
